name: Heresy
description: You take the role of a god influencing the lives of your followers in a medieval setting. Build villages, castles and defend them from raiders. Possess your followers to take direct control over their actions. Advance your civilization for better technologies, buildings, abilities, and equipment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Single Core CPU @ 1.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 4 Series or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.00GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 650 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4500 MB available space
